bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Definite Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear
Amendment: Revise Short-Circuit Rating and Test Requirement
IEEE Draft Standard for Definite Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear - Amendment: Revise Short-Circuit Rating and Test Requirement
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.13.1a /D3, Nov 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to the standard revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: low voltage ac power circuit breaker.
